data.title: Pulse Music Group 24hrs
data.meta_description: 24HRS is an artist, writer, A&R, rising music mogul and close collaborator to many of our favorite artists in Hip Hop. Known as “Twenty” to his close friends such as Ty Dolla Sign, MadeinTyo, PnB Rock, Hit Boy, Wiz Khalifa, DJ Drama, 24Hrs loves writing infectious melodies and has an ear for delivering hip-hop and R&B hits. His hometown Atlanta always having a special place in his heart, Twenty recently released his mixtape and documentary 12AM in Atlanta 2 featuring appearances from K. Camp, Young Nudy, MadeinTYO, Wiz Khalifa and Ty Dolla $ign. Relentlessly releasing music, his catalog includes collaborations with blackbear, G-Eazy, RL Grime, Machine Gun Kelly, Tyga, Kid Ink, Moneybagg Yo, Dom Kennedy, Vic Mensa, YG, Lil Pump, and Young Thug to name a few.
data.text:
Biography

24HRS is an artist, writer, A&R, rising music mogul and close collaborator to many of our favorite artists in Hip Hop. Known as “Twenty” to his close friends such as Ty Dolla Sign, MadeinTyo, PnB Rock, Hit Boy, Wiz Khalifa, DJ Drama, 24Hrs loves writing infectious melodies and has an ear for delivering hip-hop and R&B hits. His hometown Atlanta always having a special place in his heart, Twenty recently released his mixtape and documentary 12AM in Atlanta 2 featuring appearances from K. Camp, Young Nudy, MadeinTYO, Wiz Khalifa and Ty Dolla $ign. Relentlessly releasing music, his catalog includes collaborations with blackbear, G-Eazy, RL Grime, Machine Gun Kelly, Tyga, Kid Ink, Moneybagg Yo, Dom Kennedy, Vic Mensa, YG, Lil Pump, and Young Thug to name a few.
